text: Afrocanthium pseudoverticillatum is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is found from Somalia, Kenya, Tanzania and Mozambique. ==External links== *World Checklist of Rubiaceae * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Canthium robynsianum. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. title: Afrocanthium pseudoverticillatum
